overview:
Sixâ€™s experience, creativity and tenacity to overcome seemingly insurmountable engineering hurdles enabled the mywaves Chief Architect to lead her team to create the first global, carrier agnostic, and handset agnostic mobile video service.

Six built her first computer at age ten with the help of her father. Since that time, sheâ€™s honed her engineering skills and now specializes in large scale distributed systems; search systems, information architecture, categorization and discovery, digital video and music, streaming media, server design, open source methodologies and development, and cross platform integration.

She has over 20 years engineering and architectural experience working with a variety of companies including: Microsoft, MyPlay Dow Jones, and Napster.

In her spare time, Six enjoys writing science fiction, playing ice hockey, and writing small autobiographies in the third person.
